doc.field: Jon Charles Acker collection of religious certificates
Jon Charles Acker collection of religious certificates
Marriage. Brooklyn, NY. Arthur John Smith & Eva Bell Yerks
Marriage. Brooklyn, NY. Arthur John Smith & Eva Bell Yerks

Packet of documents also includes a marriage certificate for George Smith & Harriett S. Marquis (Brooklyn, NY., 1890); a 1903 Brooklyn receipt from Mr. Smith to George G. Englert (boarding and livery stable business) for embalming and other burial-related services; a 1903 Cypress Hills Cemetery receipt for the interment of Harriet Smith, aged 58, in lot 236, section 4; a 1896 program for memorial services of the Grand Army of the Republic at Cypress Hills Cemetery; and a 1898 program for memorial services at the grave of Col. James H. Perry of the 48th Regiment, New York State Volunteers.
